- 
Bricoleur is a typographic system combining two weights of the Cooper Hewitt font family. By cutting the letters on the half, it became a kinf of multi-weight font. I named this system Â« Bricoleur Â» , french word for Â« handyman Â», because the graphic designer using the font have to fix the system himself to make it legible. After 3 years hidden in my computer, I decided to release a more user-friendly version: the cut versions were superimposed in a single file.

#typedesigners #font #design #font #freefont #cooperhewitt #graphicdesign #letters #bricoleur
